title: RAK12012 WisBlock Heart Rate Sensor Module > RAK12012 WisBlock Heart Rate Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12012: Pulse Oximetry and Heart-Rate Monitor Module Overview
content: The RAK12012, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is an integrated pulse oximetry and heart-rate monitor module used for measuring person's heart rate and oxygen saturation. The sensor attached to this module is MAX30102 from Analog Devices.
parent_content: The RAK12012, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is an integrated pulse oximetry and heart-rate monitor module used for measuring person's heart rate and oxygen saturation. The sensor attached to this module is MAX30102 from Analog Devices.

title: RAK12012 WisBlock Heart Rate Sensor Module > RAK12012 WisBlock Heart Rate Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12012 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12012**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the  **RAK12012** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12012**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the  **RAK12012** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
